    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Objectifs dans des circuits optiques</string>
            <string language="en">Lenses in optical devices</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Objektive in den optischen Einheiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lentes em dispositivos óticos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Obiettivi in dispositivi ottici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φακοί στις οπτικές συσκευές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lentes en dispositivos ópticos</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre des circuits optiques qui se servent des objectifs comme les lunettes, appareil-photo et verre de contact.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows optical devices which make use of lenses like eyeglasses, camera and contact  lens.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">appareil-photo</string>
            <string language="en">camera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">verre de contact</string>
            <string language="en">contact lens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lunettes</string>
            <string language="en">eyeglasses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">objectifs</string>
            <string language="en">lenses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">circuits optiques</string>
            <string language="en">optical devices</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt optischen Einheiten, welche 
Objektive wie Brille-, Kamera- und Kontaktobjektiv gebrauchen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a dispositivos óticos 
quais empregam lentes como a lente dos eyeglasses, da câmera e de 
contato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra a dispositivi ottici 
quale usano gli obiettivi come l'obiettivo dei eyeglasses, della 
macchina fotografica e di contatto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει οπτικές συσκευές που 
χρησιμοποιούν τους φακούς όπως eyeglasses, τη φωτογραφική 
μηχανή και το φακό επαφής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a dispositivos ópticos
cuál hace uso las lentes como la lente de los eyeglasses, de la 
cámara fotográfica y de contacto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kamera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kontaktobjektiv</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brillen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Objektive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">optische Einheiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">câmera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">eyeglasses</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
